alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 2:02PM EDT until March 12 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 101 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vernon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bradford, Cottondale, Alford, Wausau, Brock Crossroad, Orange Hill, Kynesville, Ridgetop, Holmes Valley, Steele City, Gilberts Mill, Round Lake, Cottondale Airport, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Sunny Hills, Poplar Head, Compass Lake and Sylvania. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.
